segment.source: Example Filter Queries (Windows 10)
segment.target: Example Filter Queries (Windows 10)

segment.source: You can filter your compatibility-issue data or reports by selecting specific restriction criteria.
segment.target: You can filter your compatibility-issue data or reports by selecting specific restriction criteria.

segment.source: Example Filter Queries
segment.target: Example Filter Queries

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.target: Windows 8

segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012
segment.target: Windows Server 2012

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: You can filter your compatibility-issue data or reports by selecting specific restriction criteria.
segment.target: You can filter your compatibility-issue data or reports by selecting specific restriction criteria.

segment.source: Example Queries
segment.target: Example Queries

segment.source: The following sections show example queries created by using the Query Builder.
segment.target: The following sections show example queries created by using the Query Builder.

segment.source: All Applications with Issues
segment.target: All Applications with Issues

segment.source: The following example query returns all applications that have one or more known issues.
segment.target: The following example query returns all applications that have one or more known issues.

segment.source: act filter example all apps with issues
segment.target: act filter example all apps with issues

segment.source: All Applications with Solutions for Known Issues
segment.target: All Applications with Solutions for Known Issues

segment.source: The following example query returns all applications that have solutions for their known issues.
segment.target: The following example query returns all applications that have solutions for their known issues.

segment.source: act filter examples for issues with solutions
segment.target: act filter examples for issues with solutions

segment.source: All Applications with Specific Solution Types
segment.target: All Applications with Specific Solution Types

segment.source: The following example query returns all applications that have a solution type of Application Update or Application Configuration.
segment.target: The following example query returns all applications that have a solution type of Application Update or Application Configuration.

segment.source: act filter example for specific solutions
segment.target: act filter example for specific solutions

segment.source: All Applications with No Known Issues
segment.target: All Applications with No Known Issues

segment.source: The following example query returns all applications that have no known issues.
segment.target: The following example query returns all applications that have no known issues.

segment.source: act filter example all apps with no issues
segment.target: act filter example all apps with no issues

segment.source: All Applications with No Active Issues
segment.target: All Applications with No Active Issues

segment.source: The following example query returns all applications that have no active issues.
segment.target: The following example query returns all applications that have no active issues.

segment.source: act filter example all apps with no active issues
segment.target: act filter example all apps with no active issues

segment.source: All Applications Appearing in a Specific Category and Subcategory
segment.target: All Applications Appearing in a Specific Category and Subcategory

segment.source: The following example query returns all applications that have a category of Department and a subcategory of either Human Resources or Finance.
segment.target: The following example query returns all applications that have a category of Department and a subcategory of either Human Resources or Finance.

segment.source: act filter example category
segment.target: act filter example category

segment.target: Related topics
